articles.description: India vs New Zealand: Vikram Rathour said that the India batter is unfortunate due to the presence of Rishabh Pant. | Cricket
articles.content: India's batting coach Vikram Rathour was all praise for India's "ideal team man" Wriddhiman Saha following the veteran's gritty half-century knock against New Zealand on day 4 of the first Test in Ka… [+1851 chars]
